name: PixelJunk 3 in 1 Pack
description:
The diverse range of PixelJunk™ games are easy to learn, yet difficult to master. All proudly presented in glorious high definition, and each with its own striking style, there's a PixelJunk™ experience for everyone.

Try the slot-car mayhem of PixelJunk™ Racers 2nd Lap, defend your serene forest in PixelJunk™ Monsters (now also for PSP®!), and let the beats consume you as you swing, jump and soar through the swaying gardens of PixelJunk™ Eden.
